title: Deuteronomy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose a player to become your Catalyst. At night, your Catalyst can choose to visit a player to heal them (same as Doctor ability). You can't choose a Peasant.
- At night, as long as you have a Catalyst, you can Possess a player. If the player you Possess visits a player, you will astrally rampage at the house of the player they visit.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You die if your Catalyst or the player you're Possessing visits you.
- If you are hanged, you remain living for another night. You die at the day after.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4329
*Legends spun the tale of the "thing" beneath the town's chapel. Even the ministers of the chapel refused to enter the basement anymore, knowing that whatever resides beneath the chapel must remain down there.*
